HTML.SafeScripting
TYPE: lookup
VERSION: 4.5.0
DEFAULT: array()
--DESCRIPTION--
<p>
    Whether or not to permit script tags to external scripts in documents.
    Inline scripting is not allowed, and the script must match an explicit whitelist.
</p>
--# vim: et sw=4 sts=4
